chinese: 防有鵲巢、邛有旨苕。誰侜予美、心焉忉忉。
english: On the embankment are magpies' nests;On the height grows the beautiful pea.Who has been imposing on the object of my admiration?- My heart is full of sorrow.

chinese: 中唐有甓、邛有旨鷊。誰侜予美、心焉惕惕。
english: The middle path of the temple is covered with its tiles;On the height is the beautiful medallion plant.Who has been imposing on the object of my admiration?- My heart is full of trouble.
